channel.title: Ancients command
channel.description: I don't know where to get the ancients command to switch back and forth from normal to ancient magicks. Can anyone help?

item.title: Ancients command
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

Use this.

if (command.startsWith("switch")){ RemoveAllWindows(); animation(435, absY, absX); if (ancients == 1) {//Asks if the player is using ancients -zac setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //This changes the magic tab to normal magic. 1151 is normal magic interface id - zac ancients = 0;//This is set so we know if player is using normal mage - zac sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //12855 is the interface id for ancient magic - zac sendMessage("You convert to ancient magics!"); ancients = 1; //This is set so that we know if players is using ancient - zac } }

Read full topic
